**JD Vance has sparked controversy by criticizing Olympians who speak out on politics.** 
## Context / Background
The debate surrounding athletes and their right to free speech has been ongoing, with some arguing that they should stick to their sport and avoid politics. JD Vance, an American author and politician, has weighed in on the issue, stating that Olympians should not use their platform to speak out on politics.

## Tactical Key Points / Stats Table
| Olympian | Sport | Political Statement |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Chloe Kim | Snowboarding | Spoke out against Trump's policies |
| Eileen Gu | Freestyle Skiing | Addressed the importance of unity and respect |

> 'Play your sport, don't pop off about politics' - JD Vance

## What's Next?
As the debate continues, it will be interesting to see how athletes and politicians respond to JD Vance's comments. Will more Olympians speak out on politics, or will they heed Vance's advice?
